text:
We just posted a complete draft of our new book, Algorithms for Decision Making:
<http://algorithmsbook.com/>
It uses JuMP.jl for many of the key algorithms. If you have comments on how it can be improved, please let us know!

elements.text: We just posted a complete draft of our new book, Algorithms for Decision Making:
It uses JuMP.jl for many of the key algorithms. If you have comments on how it can be improved, please let us know!

text:
I have been looking for this. Really liked the previous book.
Will it be available for purchase as a PDF?
Will you consider services that allow rolling releases of purchased book (Namely the PDF is updated when errors are fixed)?
